content: परि(री)पाकः {@--1@} Being completely cooked or dressed. {@--2@} Digestion, as in अन्नपरिपाक. {@--3@} Ripening, maturing, development, perfection; <ls>Śi. 4. 48</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 10.</ls> {@--4@} Fruit, result, consequence; प्रपन्नानां मूर्तः सुकृ तपरिपाको जनिमतां <ls>Mv. 4. 31</ls>; <ls>Bh. 2. 132</ls>, <ls n="Bh.">3. 135.</ls> {@--5@} Cleverness, shrewdness, skilfulness.
